report.title: Look at Yourself with New Eyes
report.author: Chris
report.bodytext: Ive wanted to try Ecstasy (X) for a long time now. Ive been researching the pros and cons of the drug and the personal experiences from many different sources. After a lot of research I decided X was worth it. That said I would like to contribute my own experience. /n /n First off, Id like to say that Ive never tried any serious drugs before this experience. Ive had plenty of alcohol and some weed on certain occasions. This is mainly because of the lack of opportunity to try them. No contacts, no supply, living in Tampere (Finland), etc So Im pretty much a newbie as far as drugs go. To the story /n /n My friend (Matt) and I were staying with a mutual friend (Max) in London while on vacation. It was a Monday. We had bought 10 small white pills with a heart imprinted on each of them. In London X costs about 2-5 pounds () per pill and we were told that they arent as strong as the ones normally found in America. I was very excited to try these pills and I was very much hoping that I wouldnt be disappointed by an impure pill or one containing just caffeine, etc Matt and I took our first pill around 21:30. /n /n The setting is in an apartment building above a pub. The apartment is like a dorm. There is a general kitchen and bathroom with many bedrooms belonging to different tenants. My friend Max was one of these tenants. Other people who live in this apartment come into play later so its important to know this. /n /n T + 1:00: I dont feel anything and am very disappointed. I talk to some people who have tried X before and they say its possibly because I had eaten a full meal 2 hours earlier or because they werent X or were just really weak. I still have hope but not much. So Matt and I take another pill. /n /n T + 1:30: Matt says he feels a little different. Kind of like hes feeling tiny waves of happiness and euphoria washing over him. Very mildly though. I feel nothing. /n /n T + 2:00: I still feel nothing, but my friend feels the waves a little more but its still mild. We both take another pill. /n /n T + 2:30: I notice Im becoming more and more restless and talkative. Matt is looking like he feels good and says he feels sorry for me that Im not feeling what hes feeling. I decide that Ill try and concentrate on what Im feeling so Ill feel it stronger. I have become quite disappointed with X as I am not feeling what the people said they felt in their experiences. I thought maybe its just not working with my body chemistry. /n /n T + 3:00: Matt and I are in the same state as before but we decide to take another pill because basically we felt like it. Matt was definitely feeling good about something so I guess it was working for him. I was pondering why it feels good for him and why it doesnt feel much like anything to me. But then I notice I just really want to talk and open up to my 2 friends. We talk and I feel good. /n /n T + 3:30: I feel damn good. I mean really really good. Max who has tried it before tells me to rub my feet on the floor. So Im sitting there on the bed in Maxs room rubbing my bare feet against the carpet. Its amazing how such a simple tiny little action can feel so good. I was rubbing my feet on the carpet for an hour ooohing and aaaahing in ecstasy. /n /n I lose track of time so I can no longer tell you how long Ive been doing what and when I did it but I can still remember what I did. /n /n I go over to my friend Matt and we rub each others feet because it feels so good. We are very open and happy. We are both straight guys but we dont feel any need to feel weird about touching each other and rubbing each other. Normally this would never happen. We must have been rubbing each others feet for 30 minutes. It was so nice to touch and to be touched. There was nothing sexual about it, just feeling good. /n /n After a while Max goes to another room. We wonder where hes disappeared to and go search for him. We find him in Eddies room. Eddie is one of the tenants across from Max room. Eddie is an experienced X user as well as some other drugs. He is told what were on and is happy to let us in his room to listen to music and just be. I wiggle on the floor because it feels so good to rub my back against the floor. And Matt is sitting on a couch staring at nothing with a huge smile on his face. /n /n So far we really hadnt listened to music during the X trip. And I love dance/trance music normally so this is a shame. Eddie decides to put on Faithless Salva Mea for us. This music sounds absolutely wonderful. I get up and attempt to dance. I notice my coordination is lacking but I dont care and I eventually get with the beat. At that moment I wished I was at a club dancing with lots of people and this music and cool colored lights flashing. That would have been perfect at the moment. /n /n After the song finishes Eddie offers us a spliff. OOOOOOOHHH! That was soooo smooth. The smoke didnt feel like anything in my lungs but my head sure felt it. It was like a little extra boost in the good feeling I was having. I feel very good. /n /n After a while Eddie says we have to leave because he has to sleep so we do and thank him for his generosity and hospitality. /n /n We go back to Max room. And just talk and rub our feet on the floor. /n /n My friend has to go to the bathroom to piss. He comes back and says how hard it was to piss. This makes me have to piss. So I go to the bathroom and piss. I had no problem. In fact it felt good. It was the best piss Id ever taken. My legs shook because it felt so good. As Im leaving the bathroom I happen to look into the mirror. WHOA! My pupils were freakin huge. It was cool. It was fun to look at yourself with new eyes. /n /n I go back to the room and lie on the bed and stare at the ceiling. The ceilings design is white with little bumps all over it like many other ceilings. I stare that this and the bumps seem to move around like a kaleidoscope. This is interesting because my friend Matt also sees this. After staring at it for a while I focus more on the ceiling light and squint my eyes not because its bright but because I feel like it. In this squint-eyed vision I see colors pouring down onto me. From the top of my eyes a light pink color is pouring down like water onto me. From the bottom a light green is pouring down onto me. Right before they fall onto me (only in a visual sense) they mix together and its so pretty the green and pink mixing but not blending. Its so beautiful. I describe it to my friends as love is falling down on me. /n /n I get up and decide to sit by the open window. The cool breeze feels so good on me. I sit in a chair rubbing my feet on the ground with the cool breeze blowing against me and I ooh and aah in pleasure. It feels like a full body orgasm without the sex. It felt better than sex because it just lasts so long. /n /n I look at the clock and its 5:30 in the morning. I was so surprised. Earlier it felt like 10 minutes was an hour and now it appears that short periods of time were in fact long. /n /n Its also worth mentioning that speech is very difficult. You want to talk and when you can remember what youre talking about you talk so much. But short term memory is seriously disabled when it comes to speech. I would start a sentence and then half way through say What was I talking about?. And I must have done that with every other sentence. /n /n Before my X high was over I was told by my friends that it is cool to lie down and try to sleep. So I gave it a shot. At first I didnt feel like sleeping at all and I wanted to be up doing things, but then something strange happened. I started dreaming. I was dreaming very vividly while semi-awake. I was talking in my dream-like state. Every time I would say something to the people in my dreams I would wake up and my friends would look at me weird. I woke myself up at least 4 different times in this way until I finally fell asleep. /n /n The next day I felt happy and very content to just lie in bed all day and that is just what we did. /n /n This is my experience with MDMA. I hope you enjoyed it. Its very hard to get all the necessary details to explain this trip. I dont think Ive ever felt so good.
